docs.lead_paragraph: A Republican way forward on federal health policy.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Republican Ed Gillespie credits his proposal to replace Affordable Care Act for his strong showing in Virginia Senate race against Democratic incumbent Mark R Warner; urges Republican senators to take up his plan to pave the intellectual way for a positive health care alternative that a Republican presidential nominee can then take to the electorate.
docs.snippet: A Republican way forward on federal health policy.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research poll of employers on the health insurance market was conducted Aug. 19 to Oct. 8, 2014, among a random sample of 1,061 employers with at least three full-time or part-time employees.
